text: Lise Bourdin (born 20 November 1925) is a French retired movie actress. She was born in Néris-les-Bains, Allier, France. Bourdin retired in 1959, after a ten-year movie career.Le destin de la Bourbonnaise Lise Bourdin, star de l'après-guerre et oubliée aujourd'hui Some of her best known roles were in Children of Love (1953), The River Girl (1954), The Last Five Minutes (1955), Desperate Farewell (1955), La ladra (1955), Love in the Afternoon (1957), The River of Three Junks (1957), Ces dames préfèrent le mambo (1957) and The Last Blitzkrieg (1959). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors
title: Lise Bourdin
